main event: A resident of Nelson, Nebraska reported seeing a bright object that changed colors and appeared to follow him along the highway on July 10, 1959.
interesting points: The object was described as having a round shape and was at a quarter-mile distance in the sky., It was reported to hover and change directions in sync with the observer's movements., Witnesses reported that the object seemed to have fuzzy edges and appeared to be made of gas that brightens and dims., Jim Chapman became scared and sought moral support from others as the object followed him and two other witnesses., A newspaper article mentioned that three people saw the object but did not identify it as a flying saucer.
sighted object: a bright light changing from red to white
witness description: Jim Chapman and two other people from Nelson
